roleset.name: hullabaloo, commotion, fuss
roleset.note: MAKE_SCENE-M NOTES: Added by Tim/Julia during MWE framing.

role.descr: thrower of tantrum, causer of ruckus
topic or reason for the scene

example.name: make_scene-m: be in
example.text: Its embarrassing to walk into a place and have somebody make a scene about you.

example.name: cause_scene-m
example.text: My sister [23F] is causing a scene because I [28F] am skipping her wedding in favor of my sister-in-law's [29F] wedding.
example.arg: because I [28F] am skipping her wedding in favor of my sister-in-law's [29F] wedding
